scripts.clean: rm -rf css/*.css && rm -rf img/* && rm -rf fonts/* && rm -rf js/* && npm run gem-clean
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-css-components && npm run build-font && npm run build-img && npm run compile-css && npm run build-js && npm run compile-js && npm run gem
scripts.build-img: mkdir -p ./img && npm run copy-img && npm run svg
scripts.build-library-assets: npm run clean && npm run build-css && npm run compile-css && cp ./css/cloudgov-style-min.css ./docs/assets/css && npm run copy-font && cp ./fonts/* ./docs/assets/fonts
scripts.gem: npm run gem-clone-https && npm run gem-dirs && npm run gem-copy
scripts.gem-clone-https: npm run gem-clean && git clone https://github.com/18F/cg-style-gem.git ./gem
scripts.gem-clone-ssh: npm run gem-clean && git clone git@github.com:18F/cg-style-gem.git ./gem
scripts.gem-copy: npm run gem-copy-css && npm run gem-copy-js && npm run gem-copy-font && npm run gem-copy-img
scripts.gem-dirs: mkdir -p ./gem/assets/fonts && mkdir -p ./gem/app/assets/fonts && mkdir -p ./gem/assets/img && mkdir -p ./gem/app/assets/images && mkdir -p ./gem/assets/js && mkdir -p ./gem/app/assets/javascript && mkdir -p ./gem/assets/css && mkdir -p ./gem/app/assets/stylesheets
scripts.gem-commit: cd ./gem && git add . && git commit -m 'Updated with latest cloudgov-style assets' && cd ../
scripts.gem-push: cd ./gem && git push origin master && cd ../
